sources.note: Main website redirects to amsemr.com, getaps.com, or amsconnects.com via JavaScript. No content on the page itself.

Main landing page. Describes AMS as medical practice management firm in Tempe, AZ. Lists EHR, medical record retrieval, document scanning, ROI services. Emphasizes cloud-based, certified EHR with charting, inventory, scheduling.

ONC mandatory disclosures and services page. Lists Helios EHR/PMS, medical record retrieval, document scanning, ROI services. Has links to compliance certificate, export documentation, FHIR API docs, MFA use case, Real-World Testing Plans 2022-2025.

About page. Describes AMS as nationwide provider. Mentions HeliosMD and HeliosND (for naturopathic physicians). Claims physicians see 20% more patients. Lists ROI, record retrieval, document scanning, staffing services. Located in Tempe, AZ.
HeliosMD product page — returned 404. Page no longer exists.

Datafied listing for HeliosMD. Most detailed feature description found: scheduling for multiple physicians, workflow manager, customizable encounter platform, lab portal, e-prescribing, billing with fee schedules/co-pay/reconciliation, patient statements, HIPAA compliance with role-based access.

Datafied listing for HeliosND. Described as EMR for naturopathic physicians. Similar features to HeliosMD: workflow management, patient portal, scheduling, billing, e-prescribing, lab integration, HIPAA compliance.

Slashdot software listing. Lists features: appointment management, charting, e-prescribing, HIPAA compliance, patient portal, E/M coding, voice recognition, handwriting recognition, MIPS. Zero user reviews.

SourceForge listing for Helios EHR. Similar feature list to Slashdot: clinical documentation, e-prescribing, scheduling, inventory, compliance, patient portal, telehealth. Zero user reviews, 0.0/5 stars.
SoftwareFinder listing. Generic description mentioning FHIR server and Apache Cassandra — this may be conflating with a different Helios product (not AMS). Zero reviews. Custom pricing.
FindEMR listing. Mentions telehealth, care planning, ML analytics — likely conflating with a different Helios product. Zero reviews.

FindEMR listing for AMS Ultra Charts — this is from American Medical Software (americanmedical.com), a DIFFERENT company from American Medical Solutions. Confirmed distinct vendors despite similar 'AMS' abbreviation.

BBB profile. Not accredited, C+ rating. Founded 12/30/2004, 21 years in business. Corporation. Located at 2222 W Parkside Ln Ste 114, Phoenix AZ. 2 complaints total, 1 unanswered. Computer software and medical service organization category.
Arizona Technology Council member listing. 'Nationwide provider of integrated physician services and solutions.' Medical and Biotechnology category. Tempe, AZ address.
Redirect page — routes to amsemr.com. 'APS' likely refers to Attending Physician Statement services, one of AMS's ancillary offerings.
